in next 2 sts 2 half_double_crochet in last st chain 1 turn 18 st round 7 2 half_double_crochet in first st half_double_crochet in next two sts 2 half_double_crochet in next st five times half_double_crochet in second-to-last st slip_stitch in last st bind off i further shaped the wing by folding the first magic loop part a little and pulling on the beginning string to tighten the wing beak round 1 with yellow chain 2 and single_crochet 3 in second chain from hook round 2 single_crochet in each st around 3 st round 3 2 single_crochet in each st around 6 st round 4 repeat round 2 6 st round 5 2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next 2 sts twice 8 st round 6 repeat round 2 8 st bind off wattles with red chain 2 6 single_crochet in second chain from hook bind off make two comb with red chain 12 single_crochet in second chain from hook and next chain slip_stitch in next chain chain 1 half_double_crochet in next chain chain 1 single_crochet in next chain three times bind off legs i cut six 36 lengths of yellow yarn folded them in half and loop-knotted them to the end of an earflap not sure how you call this knot see pic so i had 12 lengths of 18 hanging from the tip i braided three groups of four to make the leg tied off and braided each set of four separately to make three smaller feet repeat on other side assembly sew all the pieces on use fiberfill to stuff the head and tail and glue on googly eyes cluck
